title: Oscars 2017: Vote for the Best and Worst Dressed
text: Tweet Share The Oscars on Sunday marks the last — and most glamorous — of the award shows. While wining the golden statuette might officially be the highest honor of the night, being named best dressed is almost as important. Vote on what everyone’s wearing on the red carpet at the Academy Awards . The stars’s fate is in your fingers — and don’t forget to comment below. Check back here for the final results! Hailee Steinfeld in Ralph & Russo. (Photo: Getty Images) More Isabelle Huppert in Armani. (Photo: Getty Images) More Felicity Jones in Dior. (Photo: Getty Images) More Oliva Culpo in Marchesa. (Photo: Getty Images) More Ruth Negga in Valentino. (Photo: Getty Images) More Follow us on Instagram , Facebook , and Pinterest for nonstop inspiration delivered fresh to your feed, every day.
